inventory_service¶

Inventory Management Service

This Flask application provides a RESTful API for managing goods and their inventory. It supports creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting goods, along with adjusting inventory levels. The application uses JWT-based authentication with role-based access control for admin-only actions.

Features: - Add new goods with inventory details (Admin only). - Update existing goods and inventory (Admin only). - Deduct inventory stock (Admin only). - Retrieve all goods with optional inventory details. - Retrieve specific goods by ID with inventory details. - Delete goods and their associated inventory (Admin only).

Modules: - Flask: Core framework for the application. - Flask-JWT-Extended: For token-based authentication. - SQLAlchemy: ORM for database interactions. - Bleach: Input sanitization to prevent XSS attacks.

Admin-only endpoint.

Parameters:

Returns:
